r.d:
Colorer take5 is a syntax highlighting and text parsing library, that provides services of text parsing in host editor systems in real-time and transforming results into colored text. For details, see http://colorer.sourceforge.net/
While colorer is primarily designed for use with text editors, it can be also used for non-interactive syntax highlighting, for example, in web applications. This PHP extension provides basic functions for syntax highlighting.
r.n: Added ability to specify input and output encoding
